# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-102">方法: Windows フォーム DataGridView コントロールから自動生成された列を削除する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-103">ときに、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>コントロールはその列のデータ ソースからデータに基づく自動生成を設定、特定の列を選択的に省略できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-104">呼び出すことによってこれを行う、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>メソッドを<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>コレクション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-105">設定によってビューから列を非表示にする代わりに、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>プロパティを`false`します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-106">この手法は、特定の条件に非表示の列を表示する場合、または列のデータを表示せずにアクセスする必要がある場合に便利です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-107">自動生成された列を削除するには</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-108">呼び出す、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>メソッドを<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>コレクション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-109">自動生成された列を非表示にするには</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-110">セットの列の<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>プロパティを`false`します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-112">コードのコンパイル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-113">この例で必要な要素は次のとおりです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-114">A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>という名前のコントロール`dataGridView1`を含むテーブルにバインドされている`Fax`と`CustomerID`列など、 `Customers` Northwind サンプル データベース内のテーブル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="f2ae0-115"><xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> アセンブリおよび <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> アセンブリへの参照。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f2ae0-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
